app.title: MailMate - Email made easy
app.keywords: email, mail, gmail, outlook, yahoo, mailmate, mail mate, email made easy, email made simple, email made better, email made faster, email made smarter, email made more productive, email made more efficient, email made more effective, email made more organized, email made more organized
app.author: MailMate

subSteps.title: Make sure you have 2-Step Verification enabled
Go to myaccount.google.com/security to enable two-factor authentication
Click on 2-Step Verification and scroll down to App Passwords
Select E-mail from the select app field
Select Other (Custom Name) in the Select Device field
Enter MailMate in the Device Name field

dialog.forgotAttachmentBody: It looks like you forgot to attach a file to your email. Are you sure you want to send it without the attachment?
dialog.forgotSubjectBody: Are you sure you want to send it without a subject?
dialog.invalidEmailAddressesBody: The address '{email}' in the 'To' field is not recognized. Please check that you have entered the addresses correctly.

smartWrite.title: Smart writing
smartWrite.placeholder: eg. An email to [NAME], following up on a job application, expressing your interest in the position, highlighting your qualifications, and asking for an update on the hiring process.
smartWrite.shortInput: Please provide more details to improve results.
